lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The Bundesbank is likely to steer a steady monetary course over the next few weeks and a change in credit policies is not expected at tomorrow's regular central bank council meeting, bank economists and dealers said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Others noted that exchange rates are stable after last month's Group of Six agreement in Paris and central bank money stock growth is still well above the three to six pct target zone, so a change in credit policies could be ruled out.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: This trend had been reversed recently and with domestic credit demand likely to remain at steady levels, money stock growth was expected to narrow in the medium-term.
